question:
Which of the following statements is/are correct regarding Ocean de-oxygenation?
1) There is an expansion of oxygen minimum zones in the world’s oceans.
2) It is caused due to anthropogenic emissions of carbon dioxide.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Ocean deoxygenation is defined as the reduction of the oxygen content of the oceans due to human activities. There is an expansion of oxygen minimum zones in the world’s oceans. It is caused due to anthropogenic emissions of carbon dioxide.
